help.title: Help & FAQ
help.help_description: Find answers to common questions and get support
help.faq_1_question: How do I manage my classes?
help.faq_1_answer: You can manage your classes by going to the Classes section in the main menu. There you can view all your assigned classes, add new students, and manage class schedules.
help.faq_2_answer: To take attendance, navigate to the Attendance section, select your class, and mark students as present or absent. You can also add notes for absences.
help.faq_3_answer: In the Homework section, you can create new assignments, set due dates, and attach files. Students will receive notifications about new homework.
help.faq_4_answer: Yes, you can send messages to parents through the Communication section. You can send individual messages or announcements to all parents.
help.faq_5_question: How do I update my profile?
help.faq_5_answer: Go to Settings > Profile Details to update your personal information, profile picture, and contact details.
